title: Hamukione
author: Hamukione
content: Hey everyone.I am selling one of each nVidia QuadroFX 3500, 3700 & 4500.These cards are great for AutoCAD, and GFX work, but not for mining.Shipping is from Denmark.There is no set price for the cards, shipping + whatever crypto you feel like sending /Hamukione

comments.author: Papillion
comments.body: Hey do you have photos of the cards your looking to offloadtraditionally they would add their forum name on a paper in the photos as well to prove validityc=
